column4: I've recently installed Xubuntu 10.10 and i don't have sound... can someone help me please?
I've recently installed Xubuntu 10.10 and i don't have sound... can someone help me please??
they are unmuted
What hardware are you using?
SIS onboard
Give me sometime to do some digging. I'm on a slow line...
are you using sis 7012?
yes!
I notice someone is saying that they have that problem. You can check out this page ---> http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=484876
it is tried on older versions of Ubuntu. I think it should work the same with Xubuntu. If I'm not wrong, the difference between Ubuntu and Xubuntu is the interface engine used.
but in ubuntu it works perfectly
the problem is here in Xubuntu, and i don't know why
Hmmm... I'm quite noob also... Let me see check it out...
Still there?
yeah!
If you are using Xubuntu 10.10
It shouldn't be a problem...
as Alsa is automatically loaded during bootime...
Could you open synaptic and search for alsa-utils and alsa base and check if they are installed?
yes, they are installed
Arrrgh... Sorry... I guess I'm still very noob... not sure how to help you. One experience I did have was in my sound preference, I changed my sound hardware from Internal Audio to HDMI.
you could check yours and see if you had anything similar to what I did...
